property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You make take an evolution creature from the revealed cards, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. {MANA ARMS} 5: if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total cost 6 or less.
